title: The Children's physical education display on the Melbourne Cricket Ground
creator_credit: State Film Centre of Victoria and Victoria. Visual Education Centre
brief_description: The display of seven spectacular items, presented by 17,000 children aged 7 to 17, at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on March 4, 1954, in honour of Queen Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh, in front of a crowd of 92,000. Items arranged and directed by the Physical Education Branch. Music by RAAF Central Band.
